titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4-Anilino-3-nitro-N-phenylbenzenesulphonamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/29/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4-Anilino-3-nitro-N-phenylbenzenesulphonamide.
